attributes.long-description: Oda Nobunaga is a military genius on a mission to unite  Japan. Plot strategies, choose allies, and take direct  control of troops to crush his enemies.This title has been converted from the original PlayStation®2 version to the PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation®2 peripherals, therefore some functionalities may not be available.KESSEN and the KOEI logo are registered trademarks of TECMO KOEI GAMES Co., Ltd. ©2004-2005 TECMO KOEI GAMES Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time fee for downloads to up to 2 systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Kessen® III (PS2 Classic)
